title: Steak-umm just schooled the internet on misinformation. Facebook, Twitter, and Google should take notes.
text: Frozen meat company Steak-umm has gone on another tweetstorm - this time raising awareness of how to fight misinformation.

title: Here's Why Facebook Stock Fell Today
text: The prospect of decelerating revenue growth spooked investors.

title: Twitter, Facebook, Google among major companies changing return-to-office plans amid delta variant spread
text: Many of the same companies that led the pack in sending workers home at the beginning of the pandemic are announcing policies to avoid a premature return.

title: Facebook Q2 Earnings Report: Strong Revenue Growth (56%) and Operating Margins (43%)
text: Facebook Q2 earnings report showed stunning growth and strong operating margins. Facebook is growing revenues 56% year over year with best in class operating margins of 43%.

title: Facebook's (FB) Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Up Y/Y
text: Facebook's (FB) second-quarter 2021 performance gains from robust ad revenues and user-base expansion in international markets.

title: Facebook, Spotify, Wingstop and More Thursday Afternoon Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades
text: Shares were higher across the board as we reached the midway point for Thursday trading.

title: Facebook could jump 18% as its ambition to build a 'metaverse' that hinges on creators and commerce will drive profits, BofA says
text: BofA upgraded its Facebook price target to $425 following the tech giant's second quarter earnings report.

title: Facebook Beats on Q2 Earnings, Shares Fall: ETFs in Focus
text: Facebook (FB) delivered robust second-quarter 2021 results wherein it beat both earnings and revenue estimates, However, its shares dropped.

title: Dan Ives explains why Facebook stock is down despite market-beating results
text: Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB) reported its strongest quarter since 2016 on Wednesday that saw a strong boost from a sharp surge in digital advertising that also benefitted Google, as per its report a day earlier. Shares of the company, however, are down about 4% on Thursday morning.

title: FAANG Stock Dips From Record Highs After Earnings
text: Social media giant Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ:FB) is down 3.4% at $360.05 at last check, despite yesterday reporting second-quarter earnings of $3.61 per share -- much higher than the $3.03 per share analysts anticipated.

title: What's Up With Facebook's Stock Today?
text: Facebook, Inc. Common Stock (NASDAQ:FB) shares are trading lower by 3.4% at $360.70 Thursday morning after the company reported second-quarter earnings results, Daily Active Users (DAUs) and Monthly Active Users (MAUs). DAUs were 1.91 billion on average for June 2021, an increase of 7% year-over-year.

title: Facebook Metaverse, Next Wave Of Growth Opportunities

title: 3 Must-See Metrics Behind Facebook's Staggering Q2 Growth
text: If you thought Facebook's 48% revenue growth in Q1 was impressive, check out the social network's second-quarter momentum.

title: Facebook flags progress on 'metaverse' as sales slowdown eyed in second half
text: Facebook Inc warned that a significant slowdown in sales is likely in the second half of the year as it does not see the same pandemic trends continuing to help its business. The social media behemoth reported US$29.1bn of revenue for the second quarter of 2021, up 56% on the same period a year ago thanks to higher advertising revenues as daily active users rose 7% to 1.9bn.
